rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究评估了年轻人早期负面生活事件、眶额皮质厚度和抑郁症之间的联系研究发现，早期的负面生活事件可以预测成年早期的抑郁症状，但并不是通过整个青春期的眶额皮层（OFC）加速变薄来预测的，这挑战了之前关于大脑结构变化和心理健康的假设。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-asseses-links- Between-early-negative-life-events-orbitofrontal-cortical-thickness-and-depression-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-asseses-links- Between-early-male-life-events-orbitofrontal-cortical-thickness-and-depression-in-young-adults.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=408e79c9-ba8e-41b0-aff1-fe838cfa5fc7 Sun, 10 Dec 2023 19:28:00 -0500 Study assesses links between early negative life events, orbitofrontal cortical thickness and depression in young adults
研究将空气污染与早产和低出生体重风险增加联系起来研究强调了减少怀孕期间空气污染暴露对于预防早产和低出生体重等风险的重要性，表明空气质量与孕产妇和新生儿健康结果之间存在很强的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-links-air-pollution-to-increased-risks-of-preterm-birth-and-low-birth-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-links-air-pollution-to-increased-risks-of-preterm-birth-and-low-birth-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47d015f5-60d1-47bc-908f-0ee39c9eb2c0 Sun, 10 Dec 2023 18:41:00 -0500 Study links air pollution to increased risks of preterm birth and low birth weight
研究探讨了复杂的肠-脑-肝联系及其对健康的影响研究回顾了肠-脑-肝轴，揭示了这些器官在健康和疾病中复杂的相互作用以及对治疗干预的影响，重点关注肠道微生物群如何影响肝脏和大脑健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-explores-the-intricate-gut-brain-liver-connection-and-its-impact-on-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-explores-the-intricate-gut-brain-liver-connection-and-its-impact-on-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=192a16e5-e75e-4926-ae6d-0f5cd0f934a4 Sun, 10 Dec 2023 18:28:00 -0500 Study explores the intricate gut-brain-liver connection and its impact on health
研究将有机地中海饮食与改善男性生育能力联系起来意大利研究人员发现，低碳水化合物有机地中海饮食可通过提高睾酮水平和减少精子 DNA 碎片来显着提高男性生育能力，为改善男性生殖健康提供新的饮食指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-links-organic-Mediterranean-diet-to-improved-male-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231210/Study-links-organic-Mediterranean-diet-to-improved-male-fertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5025c5f0-9dab-4455-8d3a-20cefe9a8a8e Sun, 10 Dec 2023 18:13:00 -0500 Study links organic Mediterranean diet to improved male fertility
EULAR 发布 SLE 管理更新建议SLE 是一种异质性疾病，可引起许多不同的表现和症状，传统上没有太多的治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/EULAR-publishes-updated-recommendations-for-SLE-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/EULAR-publishes-updated-recommendations-for-SLE-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39ce3ab2-9aca-41d9-9561-fef69be0237f Fri, 08 Dec 2023 23:49:04 -0500 EULAR publishes updated recommendations for SLE management
50 岁以上的女性可以安全地减少乳腺癌手术后乳房 X 光检查的频率根据圣安东尼奥乳腺癌大会上公布的 Mammo-50 试验结果，50 岁或以上的女性在接受早期乳腺癌根治性手术三年后，逐渐减少乳房 X 光检查，其结果与每年接受乳房 X 光检查的女性相似。研讨会于 2023 年 12 月 5 日至 9 日举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Women-over-50-can-safely-reduce-mammogram-Frequency-after-breast-cancer-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Women-over-50-can-safely-reduce-mammogram-Frequency-after-breast-cancer-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fdab1fc-daf1-405b-8c9e-a9a2c6fb50ff Fri, 08 Dec 2023 23:43:19 -0500 Women over 50 can safely reduce mammogram frequency after breast cancer surgery
研究发现，低风险 DCIS 患者术后可以安全地跳过放疗根据 E4112 临床试验的结果，保乳手术后跳过辅助放疗的低风险导管原位癌 (DCIS) 患者与接受辅助放疗的高风险 DCIS 患者的五年结果相当。圣安东尼奥乳腺癌研讨会，2023 年 12 月 5 日至 9 日举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Low-risk-DCIS-患者-may-safely-skip-radiotherapy-after-surgery-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Low-risk-DCIS-患者-may-safely-skip-radiotherapy-after-surgery-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adb22281-246b-4950-840d-4a88bcfc2ea9 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 23:03:02 -0500 Low-risk DCIS patients may safely skip radiotherapy after surgery, study finds
MD 安德森和 Rigel 合作扩大奥鲁西地尼在 AML 和其他癌症中的评估德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和 Rigel Pharmaceuticals, Inc. 今天宣布开展一项多年战略开发合作，以扩大奥鲁西地尼在急性髓系白血病 (AML) 和其他血液癌症中的评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/MD-Anderson-and-Rigel-partner-to-expand-olutasidenib-evaluation-in-AML-and-other-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/MD-Anderson-and-Rigel-partner-to-expand-olutasidenib-evaluation-in-AML-and-other-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f44432f-8255-4210-a6e5-e69abc372389 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 22:48:43 -0500 MD Anderson and Rigel partner to expand olutasidenib evaluation in AML and other cancers
关于抗肥胖药物如何帮助预防肾脏疾病的新见解澳大利亚研究人员的数据可以部分解释为什么最近停止了一种治疗糖尿病新药的试验，因为发现它非常有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/New-insights-into-how-anti-obesity-drugs-could-help-prevent-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/New-insights-into-how-anti-obesity-drugs-could-help-prevent-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=965f65ea-f7e6-48f6-b15d-b9f6572aeab7 Fri, 08 Dec 2023 22:28:52 -0500 New insights into how anti-obesity drugs could help prevent kidney disease
使用钻石传感器测量活组织中的大脑活动欧洲科学家最近的一项研究表明，基于钻石色心的高灵敏度传感器可用于记录活体脑组织中神经元的电活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Brain-activity-measured-in-living-tissue-using-diamond-sensors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231208/Brain-activity-measured-in-living-tissue-using-diamond-sensors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91f5ce45-9b57-4d4d-95e4-c89a61cc4c9f Fri, 08 Dec 2023 22:01:49 -0500 Brain activity measured in living tissue using diamond sensors
